title: What are the two things that cannot coexist? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 ) FAILURE :- SOMETHING THAT SOUNDS LIKE FAILURE NEVER EXIST IN THIS WORLD BECAUSE WE NEVER FAILED IN OUR LIFE WE ONLY GAINED EXPERIENCE BY DOING THE CORRECT THING IN A WRONG WAY 2) SATISFACTION :- NOT A SINGLE CREATURE IN THIS WORLD IS EVER SATISFIED BY HIS DEEDS EVERYONE WANTS MORE AND MORE IN THEIR LIFE AND WANT TO CHALLENGE THEM SELF TO EARN MORE AND MORE LUXURIES AND FACILITIES IN LIFE
